contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox lake | lake_name = Crystal Lake | image_lake = | caption_lake = | image_bathymetry = | caption_bathymetry = | location = [[Broward County, Florida]] | coords = {{coord|26|02|59|N|80|11|35|W|type:waterbody_region:US-FL_source:gnis|display=inline,title}} | type = | inflow = | outflow = | catchment = | basin_countries = United States | length = | width = | area = | depth = | max-depth = | volume = | residence_time = | shore = | elevation = {{convert|3|ft|abbr=on}} | islands = | cities = }} '''Crystal Lake''' is a lake and also a [[United States Census]]-[[Census-designated place|designated]] place in [[Broward County, Florida]]. In September 1999 the area was annexed by the [[Deerfield Beach, Florida|City of Deerfield Beach]]. The [[2010 United States Census|2010 Census]] reported a population of 5,514. == See also == * [[List of lakes in the United States]] ==External links== *{{gnis|281117|Crystal Lake (lake)}} *{{gnis|1853244|Crystal Lake (populated place)}} {{Broward County, Florida}} {{South Florida metropolitan area}} {{Florida}} [[Category:Lakes of Florida]]
